Here is the list of scores for each sign in the $LINE series:
1. Aries - 7/10 - Balanced mix of fire and air elements, making it a decent but not exceptional sign.
2. Taurus - 5/10 - Earthy nature makes it more practical than inspiring, with a tendency to be stubborn.
3. Gemini - 8/10 - Airy energy makes it quick-witted and adaptable, but can also be scattered and unpredictable.
4. Cancer - 6/10 - Emotional sensitivity makes it caring and nurturing, but can also be overly attached.
5. Leo - 9/10 - Fiery passion and charisma make it bold and attention-grabbing, but can also be prideful.
6. Virgo - 7/10 - Practical and analytical approach makes it detail-oriented and hardworking, but can also be perfectionistic.
7. Libra - 8/10 - Balanced and diplomatic nature makes it fair-minded and sociable, but can also be indecisive.
8. Scorpio - 9/10 - Intense passion and intuition make it perceptive and determined, but can also be intense and private.
9. Sagittarius - 7/10 - Adventurous and optimistic approach makes it expansive and enthusiastic, but can also be reckless.
10. Capricorn - 6/10 - Serious and disciplined nature makes it responsible and ambitious, but can also be rigid.
11. Aquarius - 8/10 - Humanitarian and independent approach makes it innovative and unconventional, but can also be detached.
12. Pisces - 5/10 - Dreamy and empathetic nature makes it compassionate and imaginative, but can also be unclear and scattered.
Note that these scores are subjective and based on general astrological principles, rather than scientific or empirically proven facts.
